wizard.name: All Diagrams
wizard.description: Export all diagrams in a Tigerstripe Model project to pictures.

wizard.name: Tigerstripe Module
wizard.description: Export Tigerstripe model project to read-only module.

action.label: Package...
action.tooltip: Package and deploy this Tigerstripe plugin

action.label: Deploy
action.tooltip: Package and deploy this Tigerstripe plugin

action.label: Audit Diagrams
action.tooltip: Create an audit report on diagrams

command.description: Open the Tigerstripe deployed generator dialog
command.name: Plugins

command.description: Open the Tigerstripe active profile dialog
command.name: Profile

commonFilter.name: Classpath containers
commonFilter.description: Hides all classpath containers except referenced projects

commonFilter.name: External libraries
commonFilter.description: Hides external libraries (except modules) i.e. those not contained inside the project itself

commonFilter.name: Empty parent packages
commonFilter.description: Hides empty packages which do not contain components but other sub-folders. E.g. given a package 'org.junit' where 'org' does not contain any Java files, this filter will hide the package 'org' but not the package 'org.junit'
